casebody.data:
IN RE: E.B.M., Z.A.M. 212A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 10, 2019

J. Lee Gilliam, Assistant Parent Defender.

Lucy R. McCarl, Attorney at Law, Lenoir.

Lawrence F. Matthews, Attorney Advocate for GAL. Erin H. Epley, Attorney Advocate for GAL.

Rebekah W. Davis, Attorney at Law.

Wendy C. Sotolongo, Parent Defender.

The following order has been entered on the Joint Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 9th of July 2019 by Petitioner and Guardian ad Litem:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of July 2019."

Petitioner and Guardian ad Litem shall have up to and including the 7th day of August 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
